reference.title: apiSyntaxText
reference.shortdesc: The <apiSyntaxText> element provides the representation in the programming language for the declared interface for the API item.

section.title: Description
section.p: In the <apiDef> element, the <apiSyntaxText> element can supplement or replace the semantic declaration of the same interface. When a specialization provides a complete representation of the interface within a specialized <apiDef> element, the <apiSyntaxText> element can be omitted. The Java DITA API reference takes this approach.
